revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Radio Tower |image = [[File:Radio Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Radio Tower. |tokens = 5,750 |location = Goldenrod City }} '''Radio Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 112,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
